===Etymology===
From {{der|yue|cmn|-}} {{zh-l|購物|shopping}}, from an Internet meme in 2014. During a news report, an anti-{{w|Occupy Central}} protester was asked why she was at the protest. She forgot how to say “shopping” in Cantonese and replied with ''gòuwù'', exposing her identity as a Mainlander.
